alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Juan Mountains and La Garita Mountains Including Wolf Creek Pass and Creede (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 27 at 12:39PM MDT until May 27 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning remains in effect today from Noon to 8 PM for gusty winds and low relative humidity for Fire Weather Zones 223 and 224 which includes the Eastern San Juan Mountains, the La Garita Mountains, and the San Luis Valley... ...A Red Flag Warning remains in effect for Saturday from 11 AM to 10 PM for gusty winds and low relative humidity for Fire Weather Zones 222 through 224, and 226 through 237, which includes the Interstate-25 corridor eastward across the plains as well as Fremont County below 8000 feet, in addition to the Eastern San Juan Mountains, the La Garita Mountains, and the San Luis Valley... ...A Fire Weather Watch has been issued from Sunday afternoon through Sunday evening for gusty winds and low relative humidity for Fire Weather Zones 222, 224, and 226 through 237 which includes the Interstate-25 corridor eastward across the plains as well as Fremont County below 8000 feet, in addition to the San Luis Valley... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 223... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 10 PM MDT SATURDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 223... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 223. * Winds...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread. * Lightning...Isolated cloud to ground lightning flashes will also be possible this afternoon.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Juan Mountains and La Garita Mountains Including Wolf Creek Pass and Creede
